markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Hazardous Terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=454)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 476 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Hazardous terrain damages you whenever you move through it. An acid pool and a pit of burning embers are both examples of hazardous terrain. The amount and type of damage depend on the specific hazardous terrain.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Hazardous Terrain

</additional-info>
